channel.title: CRM Recommendations for Small Business?
channel.description:
We use G Suite and are ~6 sales people selling physical products from a warehouse. Currently using no CRM besides our email and now we need a more coordinated effort.
Is anyone with a similar team size using a CRM they'd like to recommend?
